content:
DBindingCollection Interface

Definition

Provides an interface to replace COM-based data binding in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

In this Article

[System.CLSCompliant(false)]
[System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
public interface DBindingCollection : System.Collections.IEnumerable

Remarks

Note

Functions and objects in the N:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Properties

Count

Gets the total number of bindings in the DBindingCollection.

public int Count { get; }
Value
Int32

An Integer that contains the count.

Remarks

Note

Functions and objects in the N:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Gets or sets the data member for a DBindingCollection.

public string DataMember { get; set; }
Value
String

They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Gets or sets the data source for a DBindingCollection.

public msdatasrc.DataSource DataSource { get; set; }
Value
msdatasrc.DataSource

A COM-based msdatasrc.DataSource object.

Functions and objects in the N:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Gets the DBinding at the specified index.

Methods

Add(Object,String,String,IDataFormatDisp,String)

Adds a DBinding to a DBindingCollection.

public Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding Add (object obj, string propertyName, string dataField, Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp dataFormat = null, string key = null);

Object

An Object that contains data.

propertyName
String

A String that contains a property name.

dataField
String

A String that contains the name of a data field.

dataFormat
IDataFormatDisp

Optional. An IDataFormatDisp interface.

key
String

Optional. A String that contains the key value.
